#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--){
        int a,b,x,l;
        cin >> a >> b;
        if(b==0){
            cout << "1" << endl;
            continue;
        }
        else{
            l = a;
            x = b%4;
            if(b%4==0)
                x = 4;
            for(int i=2;i<=x;i++)
                l = (l*a)%10;
            cout << l%10 << endl;
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
